deactivate.title: Deactivate Account
deactivate.dialogDescription: This will temporarily disable your account and hide your profile from other users.

warningList.profileHidden: Your profile will be hidden from other researchers
warningList.contentAccessible: Your experiments, macros, and protocols will remain accessible to collaborators
warningList.loggedOut: You will be logged out of your account
warningList.canReactivate: You can reactivate your account by logging in again

delete.title: Delete Account
delete.description: Permanently delete your account and all associated data. This cannot be undone.

warningPreserveList.content: Experiments, macros, and protocols will remain intact and have ownership transferred to a system account

delete.successMessage: Account deleted. Your personal data has been erased, but your published contributions remain attributed to a system account.
